component.name: activities
component.subComponents:
getActivityTypes.xml Retrieves meta data about activity types
getPagingToken.xml Retrieves a token for a given date
getLeadActivities.xml Retrieves lead activities for the requested activity types
getLeadChanges.xml Retrieves change data value for leads getDeletedLeads
getDeletedLeads.xml Retrieves a list of leads that were deleted
